name: Rage Fighters
description:
Rage Fighters is a Game where You can Challenge Your Friends!
A 2D Couch Coop Game with 2 People in 1 Keyboard Control!   ;) Features:

| 4 Maps

| 5 Player Abilities

| 7 Charecters

AND MORE!!!

System Requirements:

1GB RAM

No Video RAM

Intel Core 2 Duo

Controls: Player 1

W A S D  -  Movement

Space  -  Jump

J  -  Attack

Player 2

Arrow Keys  -  Movement

Right Ctrl  -  Jump

Numpad 0  -  Attack

Challenge Your Friends!!!
